resources.string:
"Recording:
 Press 'Start Tracking' to start recording data. Press 'Stop Tracking' to stop recording. Make sure GPS and WiFi is enabled for best results.

"+ "Placement:
 Horizontal with the top of the phone facing in the direction of travel. The screen should be visible.

"+ "Axes:
 Axes are measured in the phone coordinate system as vectors. Z points out of the screen, Y out of the top and X out of the right side of your phone.

"+ "Graph:
 The graph displays acceleration as a function of data points. Blue is X, red is Y and white is Z."
